title: Early awkward grotesque from German swiss international style poster
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818125735im_/http:/media-cache-ec4.pinterest.com/736x/ba/e4/ba/bae4ba506134e1b76b30ee9f944b70c9.jpg)

Any clues? I have no idea on the source of this poster either. I also doubt whether it's actually a typeface
author: oneweioranother

comments.content: referring to the "pyrexal" logo in the top right by the way

well, it's apparently a medical ad designed by Herman Rastorfer. as shown in [Graphis Annual 59](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818125735/http:/thenonist.com/index.php/weblog/permalink/graphis_annual_59_part_1/)
thanks Jodie, were you familiar with the poster already? that is some gooood source finding
nope. i just poke around a lot. :)
